review: This is a great product.  We have satellite and had taped many episodes of series but beginning in advanced seasons.  Now we are able to catch up with the videos on Amazon Prime.  We could have put our satellite on vacation for the past three months.

review: I use the amazon fire TV for prime shows and movies and to watch media on my main computer.  I have had no issues with it for those purposes, I also play some games on it as well.

review: I have tons of cable channels (far more than I care for, in fact) but I always end up finding something to do my AFTV box. My grandchildren love being able to play Minecraft on my giant TV, while someone else plays on a Kindle so that they can join up worlds and do whatever the heck they do on there together. That alone, has made it worth the purchase price.
